data.name: Reality End
data.detailed_description:
Reality End Metaverse Shooter.
2022 new version includes VR and Non-VR Modes, Ready Player Me Avatars, Vehicles, Tanks, Cars, Special Attacks, and Voice chat. and A few more?

Features

  • Room-based multiplayer, currently up to 3000 players per room. Yet never tested. waiting for the 2999 player. maybe it's you!
  • Full hands controller support.
  • Play as a human or as an android - does it really matter? zombies are coming next year.
  • 4 game maps - In Beta stage, or Alpha stage, or if yo fall somewhere, don't complain just, you know... only 2 online. 10 more are underground.
  • Ready Player Me - Meraverse avatars support - This is a real must!
  • Vehicles including Cars and Tanks - Don't let them sink in the sand.
  • Special attacks - UAV, Drone support, and Missile. Should work. at least the Drone works occasionally
  • 4 Game modes: Free for all, Team Deathmatch, Capture the flag, Demolition.
  • Left/Right-handedness support. In most parts.
  • Voice communication.
  • AI bots. well, they could use a leader like you. well. not have to be a leader, anyway, they are there. It's a fact. don't run from it. and they can kill you, virtually I mean.
  • VR Hand Pad with command buttons

Updating every day!

data.short_description: Reality End Metaverse Shooter. Just not enough lines here. read the section below if you are into reading. Personally, I'm not...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-9500 / AMD Ryzen 7 3700 or greater
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound card
